title: A Brief History Of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: One of the smartest scientists explains the most complex topics of modern physics in a relatively simple way. In addition to explaining the universe and its origins, Stephen Hawking also does not hesitate to reveal all the theories behind it.
recommendetFor: A must-read for any astropysics enthusiast! It really made my craving for knowledge explode, since it was the first book about science I've ever read.
